column2: name=Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings

column1: '''Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings''' is a parody that combines elements from ''[[wikipedia:Jet Set Willy
column2: Jet Set Willy]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/jetsetwilly.html Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 24 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 10 (retrieved 24 April 2011)</ref> It was written by [[Andrew Broad]] and is freeware.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum
column3: World of Spectrum]] (retrieved at 24 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 24 April 2011)</ref> It was released at the same time as its companion game [[Manic Miner: The Hobbit]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/>
